anya-e0904n:10_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0904n:10_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte
anya-e0904n:10_2: tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:11_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0904n:11_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttasaṅkhāte
anya-e0904n:11_2: tayo nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ navahi ca suttasahassehi pañcahi ca suttasattehi
anya-e0904n:11_3: sattapaññāsāya ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṃ
anya-e0904n:12: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāyepi āvuso ekakanipāto dukanipāto tikanipātotiādinā nipātapakaraṇaparicchedavasena ekādasavidhā. Tattha kataraṃ nipātapakaraṇaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:13: Vissajjanā – aṅguttaranikāye bhante ekādasasu nipātapakaraṇaparicchedesu ekakanipātaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:15: Pucchā – ekakanipātepi āvuso rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggo akammaniyavaggotiādinā vaggabhedavasena bahuvidhā. Tattha kataraṃ vaggaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:16: Vissajjanā – ekakanipāte bhante rūpādivaggo nīvaraṇappahānavaggotiādinā vīsatiyā vaggesu rūpādivaggaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0904n:17_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, mayampi dāni āvuso tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgāhanatthāya
anya-e0904n:17_2: bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte rūpādivagge
anya-e0904n:17_3: purimāni pañca suttāni kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:18_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ pañcannaṃ
anya-e0904n:18_1: purisānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0904n:18_2: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave itthirūpaṃ, itthirūpaṃ
anya-e0904n:18_3: bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:19_0: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0904n:19_1: tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave itthirūpaṃ, itthirūpaṃ bhikkhave purisassa cittaṃ
anya-e0904n:20: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pacchimāni pañca suttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:21_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha rūpādigarukānaṃ
anya-e0904n:21_1: pañcannaṃ itthīnaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:21_2: yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave purisarūpaṃ, purisarūpaṃ
anya-e0904n:21_3: bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:22_0: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0904n:22_1: tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave purisarūpaṃ, purisarūpaṃ bhikkhave itthiyā cittaṃ
anya-e0904n:24: Pucchā – imasmiṃ āvuso rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena kiṃ kathitaṃ, neyyatthavasena pana kiṃ ñāpitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:25: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante rūpādivagge bhagavatā nītatthavasena vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. Neyyatthavasena pana vivaṭṭampi ñāpitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:27: Pucchā – dutiyo pana āvuso nīvaraṇappahānavaggo bhagavatā kattha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:28_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:28_1: yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0904n:28_2: saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave subhanimittaṃ, subhanimittaṃ bhikkhave ayoniso manasikaroto
anya-e0904n:28_3: anuppannoceva kāmacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0904n:29: Pucchā – imasmiṃ pana āvuso dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā kiṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:30: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ pana bhante dutiye nīvaraṇappahānavagge bhagavatā vaṭṭampi vivaṭṭampi kathitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:32: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte tatiye akammaniyavagge kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:33_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye bhante akammaniyavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:33_1: yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ, cittaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:33_2: abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti. Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ
anya-e0904n:33_3: evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ. Cittaṃ bhikkhave bhāvitaṃ
anya-e0904n:33_4: kammaniyaṃ hotī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:35: Pucchā – catutthe panāvuso adantavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:36_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante adantavagge “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:36_1: yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ, cittaṃ
anya-e0904n:36_2: bhikkhave adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati. Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi
anya-e0904n:36_3: samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ,
anya-e0904n:36_4: cittaṃ bhikkhave dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:38: Pucchā – pañcame āvuso paṇihitaacchavagge bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:39_0: Vissajjanā – pañcame bhante paṇihitaacchavagge “seyyathāpi bhikkhave sālisūkaṃ vā
anya-e0904n:39_1: yavasūkaṃ vā micchāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati,
anya-e0904n:39_2: lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhāna vijjati. Taṃ kissahetu, micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:39_3: sūkassa. Evameva kho bhikkhave so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati,
anya-e0904n:39_4: vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, taṃ kissa hetu,
anya-e0904n:39_5: micchāpaṇihitattā bhikkhave cittassā”ti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:41: Pucchā – accharāsaṅghātavagge āvuso paṭhama dutiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:42_0: Vissajjanā – accharāsaṅghātavagge bhante bhagavatā “pabhassaramidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ,
anya-e0904n:42_1: tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ, taṃ assutavā puthujjano yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0904n:42_2: nappajānāti, tasmā ‘assutavato puthujjanassa cittabhāvanā natthī’ti vadāmi. Pabhassaramidaṃ
anya-e0904n:42_3: bhikkhave cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ, taṃ subhavā ariyasāvako
anya-e0904n:42_4: yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Tasmā ‘sutapato ariyasāvakassa cittabhāvanā atthī’ti vadāmī”ti.
anya-e0904n:44: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:45_1: ce bhikkhave bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevati, bhāveti, manasikaroti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:45_2: bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0904n:45_3: bhuñjati, ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkaronti. Yekeci bhikkhave dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā
anya-e0904n:45_4: akusalapakkhikā, sabbete manopubbaṅgamā, mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0904n:45_5: anvadeva akusalādhammā, yekeci bhikkhave dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā,
anya-e0904n:45_6: sabbete manopubbaṅgamā, mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, anvadeva kusalā
anya-e0904n:45_7: dhammā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:47: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:48_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhama navama dasamasuttāni ca vīriyārambhādivagge
anya-e0904n:48_1: dasasuttāni ca kalyāṇamittādivagge paṭhamasuttañca “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi
anya-e0904n:48_2: samanupassāmi, yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā vā kusalā dhammā
anya-e0904n:48_3: parihāyanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave pamādo, pamattassa bhikkhave anuppannā ceva akusalā
anya-e0904n:48_4: dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:50: Pucchā – kalyāṇamittādivagge āvuso dutiya tatiyasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:51_0: Vissajjanā – kalyāṇamittādivagge bhante dutiya tatiyasuttāni “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ
anya-e0904n:51_1: ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
anya-e0904n:51_2: vā kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave anuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ananuyogo
anya-e0904n:53: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:54_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante chaṭṭhasuttādīni ca pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttañca “appamattikā
anya-e0904n:54_1: esā bhikkhave parihāni yadidaṃ ñātiparihāni. Etaṃ patikiṭṭhaṃ bhikkhave parihānīnaṃ
anya-e0904n:54_2: yadidaṃ paññāparihānīti. Appamattikā esā bhikkhave vuddhi yadidaṃ ñātivuddhi. Etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n:54_3: bhikkhave vuddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ paññāvuddhi. Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘paññāvuddhiyā
anya-e0904n:54_4: vaddhissāmā’ti. Evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:56: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena pamādādivagge dutiyasuttādīni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:57_0: Vissajjanā – nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya
anya-e0904n:57_1: saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave pamādo. Pamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n:57_2: Nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi, yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ
anya-e0904n:57_3: bhikkhave appamādo, appamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:59: Pucchā – dutiye panāvuso pamādādivagge paṭhamasuttādīni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:60_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye bhante pamādādivagge ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ
anya-e0904n:60_1: ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:60_2: pamādo. Pamādo bhikkhave mahato anatthāya saṃvattati. Ajjhattikaṃ bhikkhave aṅganti
anya-e0904n:60_3: karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ
anya-e0904n:60_4: bhikkhave appamādo. Appamādo bhikkhave mahato atthāya saṃvattatīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:62: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tettiṃsamādīnica dasasuttāni adhammavagge ca dasasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:63_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tettiṃsamādīni dasasuttāni ca adhammavagge dasasuttāni
anya-e0904n:63_1: ca ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “dhammo”ti dīpenti, te bhikkhave bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya
anya-e0904n:63_2: paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:63_3: Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentīti
anya-e0904n:63_4: evamādinā ca, ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū adhammaṃ “adhammo”ti dīpenti, te bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:63_5: bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya bahujano janassa atthāya hitāya
anya-e0904n:63_6: sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Bahuñca te bhikkhave bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ
anya-e0904n:63_7: ṭhapentīti evamādinā ca bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:65: Pucchā – ekapuggalavagge āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:66_0: Vissajjanā – ekapuggalavagge bhante bhagavatā ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno
anya-e0904n:66_1: uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:66_2: Katamo ekapuggalo, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekapuggalo
anya-e0904n:66_3: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya
anya-e0904n:66_4: sukhāya devamanussānanti evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:69: Pucchā – etadavagge āvuso āgatesu ekacattālīsāya theresu āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:70_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:70_1: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti, evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n:72_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge
anya-e0904n:72_1: āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā ca sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati paṭhamo
anya-e0904n:72_2: aggasāvako āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānatthero dutiyo aggasāvako kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:73_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n:73_1: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti. Āyasmā pana mahāmoggallānatthero
anya-e0904n:73_2: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti.
anya-e0904n:73_3: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:74: Idaṃ te āsanaṃ vīra, paññattaṃ tavanucchaviṃ;
anya-e0904n:76: Ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhu aññataro.
anya-e0904n:77: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ.
anya-e0904n:82: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0904n:83: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto.
anya-e0904n:84: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno.
anya-e0904n:86: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle pāmokkhasaṅghanāyakabhūto bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:87_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle saṅghapāmokkhabhūto
anya-e0904n:87_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti.
anya-e0904n:87_2: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:89: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā anuruddhatthero kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:90: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante anuruddhatthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:92: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso sīvalitthero bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:93: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante sīvalitthero “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvalī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:94: Sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e0904n:95: Suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
anya-e0904n:96: Susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ, yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjati –
anya-e0904n:97: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvali” hu –
anya-e0904n:99: Pucchā – āyasmā pana āvuso ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle dhammavissajjakatherabhūto kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:100_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante ānandatthero dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle
anya-e0904n:100_1: dhammavissajjakabhūto “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
anya-e0904n:100_2: yadidaṃ ānando. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satimantānaṃ yadidaṃ
anya-e0904n:100_3: ānando. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gatimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando.
anya-e0904n:100_4: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhitimantānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando. Etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n:100_5: bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n:105: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ. Satimantānaṃ. Gatimantānaṃ. Dhitimantānaṃ. Upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando” –
anya-e0904n:107_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge
anya-e0904n:107_1: āgatesu ekacattālīsāya mahātheresu āyasmā upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto
anya-e0904n:108_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante upālitthero paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle vinayavissajjakabhūto
anya-e0904n:108_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0904n:114: Pucchā – etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpati gotamītherī kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:115_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therīsu mahāpajāpatigotamītherī
anya-e0904n:115_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpati
anya-e0904n:115_2: gotamī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:116: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamī” –
anya-e0904n:117: Pucchā – khemātherī pana āvuso aggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:118: Vissajjanā – khemātherī bhante paṭhamā aggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:123: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ khemā” –
anya-e0904n:124: Pucchā – uppalavaṇṇā pana āvuso therī dutiyaaggasāvikā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:125_0: Vissajjanā – uppalavaṇṇā bhante therī dutiyaaggasāvikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n:125_1: sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n:126: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ iddhimantīnaṃ yadidaṃ uppalavaṇṇā” –
anya-e0904n:128: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu terasasu therīsu paṭācārānāma therī kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:129_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu terasasu therikāsu paṭācārā therī “etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n:129_1: bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā”ti evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n:148: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārā” –
anya-e0904n:150: Pucchā – dhammadinnā pana āvuso therī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:151: Vissajjanā – dhammadinnā bhante therī “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:156: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammadinnā” –
anya-e0904n:158: Pucchā – bhaddakaccānānāma āvuso yasodharātherī bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:159_0: Vissajjanā – bhaddakaccānā bhante yasodharātherī bhagavatā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama
anya-e0904n:159_1: sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n:160: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ mahābhiññapattānaṃ yadidaṃ bhaddakaccānā” –
anya-e0904n:162: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu tapussabhallikānāma vāṇijā bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:163_0: Vissajjanā – tapussabhallikā bhante vāṇijā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ
anya-e0904n:163_1: paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā”ti, evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0904n:164: “Ete bhante mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate” hu –
anya-e0904n:165: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ yadidaṃ tapussabhallikā vāṇijā” –
anya-e0904n:167_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā arahatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte
anya-e0904n:167_1: etadaggavagge āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:168_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatesu ekādasasu upāsakesu sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko
anya-e0904n:168_1: “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati
anya-e0904n:168_2: anāthapiṇḍiko”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:169: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ dāyakānaṃ yadidaṃ sudatto gahapati anāthapiṇḍiko–
anya-e0904n:171: Pucchā – sūrambaṭṭho nāma āvuso upāsako bhagavatā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:172: Vissajjanā – sūrambaṭṭho upāsako “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.
anya-e0904n:173: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ sūrambaṭṭho” hu –
anya-e0904n:175: Pucchā – etadaggavagge āvuso āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu sujātānāma upāsikā seniyadhītā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:176_0: Vissajjanā – sujātā bhante seniyadhītā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ
anya-e0904n:176_1: paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n:177: “Etā mayaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca, upāsikāyo no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetā saraṇaṃ gatā” hu –
anya-e0904n:178: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ yadidaṃ sujātā seniyadhītā” –
anya-e0904n:180: Pucchā – visākhā pana āvuso upāsikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:181_0: Vissajjanā – visākhā bhante upāsikā migāramātā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n:181_1: upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:182: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ dāyikānaṃ yadidaṃ visākhā migāramātā” hu –
anya-e0904n:184: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye ekakanipāte etadaggavagge āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarānāma upāsikā kathaṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:185_0: Vissajjanā – etadaggavagge bhante āgatāsu dasasu upāsikāsu khujjuttarā upāsikā “etadaggaṃ
anya-e0904n:185_1: bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā”ti evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n:186: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ khujjuttarā” hu –
anya-e0904n:188: Pucchā – kāḷīnāma āvuso upāsikā kuraragharikā kathaṃ bhagavatā etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitā.
anya-e0904n:189_0: Vissajjanā – kāḷī bhante upāsikā kuraragharikā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ
anya-e0904n:189_1: anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā
anya-e0904n:190: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ anussavappasannānaṃ yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā” –
anya-e0904n:192: Pucchā – sakalāpi āvuso aṭṭhānapāḷi bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0904n:193_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañcisaṅkhāraṃ
anya-e0904n:193_1: niccato upagaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ bhikkhave vijjati,
anya-e0904n:193_2: yaṃ puthujjano kañcisaṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya, ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:195: Pucchā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ āvuso paṭhamavagge kīdisī dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n:196_0: Vissajjanā – ekadhammapāḷiyaṃ bhante paṭhamavagge “ekadhammo bhikkhave bhāvito bahulīkato
anya-e0904n:196_1: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0904n:196_2: Katamo ekadhammo, buddhānussati, ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato
anya-e0904n:196_3: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti
anya-e0904n:197: Pucchā – dutiyavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:198_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyavagge bhante bhagavatā “nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
anya-e0904n:198_1: yena anuppannā vā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā vā akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0904n:198_2: vepullāya saṃvattanti, yathayidaṃ bhikkhave micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhikassa bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:198_3: anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0904n:198_4: vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti. Evamādikā bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:200: Pucchā – tatiyavagge pana āvuso pañcamādīni aṭṭha suttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:201_0: Vissajjanā – tatiyavagge bhante pañcamādīni aṭṭhasuttāni “durakkhāte bhikkhave dhammavinaye
anya-e0904n:201_1: yo ca samādapeti, yañca samādapeti, yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati. Sabbete
anya-e0904n:201_2: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavanti. Taṃkissahetu, durakkhābhattā bhikkhave dhammassa. Svākkhāte
anya-e0904n:201_3: bhikkhave dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti, yañca samādapeti, yo ca samādapito, tathattāya
anya-e0904n:201_4: paṭipajjati, sabbete bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti. Taṃkissahetu svākkhātattā bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:203: Pucchā – aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:204_1: bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu arittajjhāno viharati
anya-e0904n:204_2: satthusāsanakaro ovādapatikaro amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjati, ko pana vādo ye naṃ
anya-e0904n:204_3: bahulīkarontī”ti evamādikā bhante bhagavatā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:206: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso kāyagatāsativaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:207_0: Vissajjanā – yassa kassaci bhikkhave mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo, antogadhā tassa kunnadiyo
anya-e0904n:207_1: yākāci samuddaṅgamā, evameva bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā,
anya-e0904n:207_2: antogadhā tassa kusalā dhammā yekeci vijjābhāgiyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi
anya-e0904n:209: Pucchā – sakalopi āvuso amatavaggo bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsato.
anya-e0904n:210_0: Vissajjanā – amataṃ te bhikkhave na paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0904n:210_1: Amataṃ te bhikkhave paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjanti. Amataṃ te bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:210_2: aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā. Amataṃ te bhikkhave paribhuttaṃ, yesaṃ
anya-e0904n:210_3: kāyagatāsati paribhuttāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā sakalopi amatavaggo bhāsito.
anya-e0904n:212: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte kammakaraṇavagge paṭhamaṃ vajjasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:213: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave vajjāni. Katamāni dve diṭṭhadhammikañca vajjaṃ samparāyikañca vajja”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:214_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikassa vajjassa bhāyissāma, samparāyikassa
anya-e0904n:214_1: vajjassa bhāyissāma, vajjabhīruno bhavissāma vajjabhayadassāvino”ti. Evañhi kho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0904n:216: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyaṃ padhānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:217_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “dvemāni bhikkhave padhānāni
anya-e0904n:217_1: durabhisambhavāni lokasmiṃ. Katamāni dve, yañca gihīnaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasataṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānuppādanatthaṃ
anya-e0904n:217_2: padhānaṃ, yañca agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattaṃ padhānaṃ.
anya-e0904n:217_3: Imāni kho bhikkhave dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni lokasmi”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:219: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:220_0: Vissajjanā – dveme bhikkhave dhammā tapanīyā. Katame dve, idha bhikkhave ekaccassa
anya-e0904n:220_1: kāyaduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti kāya sucaritaṃ, vacīduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti,
anya-e0904n:220_2: akataṃ hoti vacīsucaritaṃ, manoduccaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti manosucaritaṃ.
anya-e0904n:220_3: So “kāyaduccaritaṃ me kata”nti tappati, “akataṃ me kāyasucarita”nti tappati. Vacīduccaritaṃ
anya-e0904n:220_4: (pa) “manoduccaritaṃ me kata”nti tappati, “akataṃ me manosucarita”nti tappati. Ime
anya-e0904n:220_5: kho bhikkhave dve dhammā tapanīyāti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:222: Pucchā – catutthaṃ pana āvuso atapanīyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:223_0: Vissajjanā – catutthaṃ bhante atapanīyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā atapanīyā.
anya-e0904n:223_1: Katame dve, idha bhikkhave ekaccassa kāyasucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti kāyaduccaritaṃ.
anya-e0904n:223_2: Vacīsucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ hoti vacīduccaritaṃ. Manosucaritaṃ kataṃ hoti, akataṃ
anya-e0904n:223_3: hoti manoduccaritaṃ. So ‘kāyasucaritaṃ me kata’nti na tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti
anya-e0904n:223_4: natappati. ‘Vacīsucaritaṃ…pe… manosucaritaṃ me kata’nti na tappati. ‘Akataṃ me manoduccarita’nti
anya-e0904n:223_5: na tappati. Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:225: Pucchā – pañcamaṃ pana āvuso upaññātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:226_0: Vissajjanā – pañcamaṃ bhante upaññātasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave dhammānaṃ upaññāsiṃ.
anya-e0904n:226_1: Yā ca asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesu, yā ca appaṭivānitā padhānasmiṃ. Appaṭivāni
anya-e0904n:226_2: sudāhaṃ bhikkhave padahāmi ‘kāmaṃ-taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu upasussatu
anya-e0904n:226_3: sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ,
anya-e0904n:226_4: na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:228: Pucchā – navamaṃ pana āvuso cariyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:229_0: Vissajjanā – navamaṃ bhante cariyasuttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave dhammā sukkā lokaṃ pālenti.
anya-e0904n:229_1: Katame dve, hirīca ottappañca. Ime kho bhikkhave dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
anya-e0904n:231: Pucchā – adhikaraṇavagge pana āvuso sattamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:232_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante jāṇussoṇiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Jāṇussoṇi
anya-e0904n:232_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0904n:232_2: midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
anya-e0904n:232_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa
anya-e0904n:232_4: bhedā paraṃmaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:233: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n:234: “Katattāca brāhmaṇa akatattāca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti” –
anya-e0904n:235: Ko pana bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti –
anya-e0904n:236: Katattā ca brāhmaṇa akatattā ca evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
anya-e0904n:237: Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ –
anya-e0904n:238: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu.
anya-e0904n:240: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:241: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmato ānandassa “ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda akaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyaduccaritaṃ manoduccarita”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:242: “Ekaṃsenāhaṃ ānanda karaṇīyaṃ vadāmi kāyasucaritaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ manosucaritaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:244: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte adhikaraṇavagge navamasuttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:245_0: Vissajjanā – akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahatha, sakkā bhikkhave akusalaṃ pajahituṃ. Nocedaṃ
anya-e0904n:245_1: bhikkhave sakkā abhavissa akusalaṃ pajahituṃ, nāhaṃ evaṃ vadeyyaṃ “akusalaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:245_2: pajahathā”ti. Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave sakkā akusalaṃ pajahituṃ, tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi
anya-e0904n:245_3: “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti. Akusalañca hidaṃ bhikkhave pahīnaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya
anya-e0904n:245_4: saṃvatteyya, nāhaṃ evaṃvadeyyaṃ “akusalaṃ bhikkhave pajahathā”ti. Yasmā ca kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:245_5: akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, tasmāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi “akusalaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:247: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaekādasamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:248_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaekādasamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa
anya-e0904n:248_1: sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame dve, dunnikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho
anya-e0904n:248_2: ca dunnīto, dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti. Ime kho
anya-e0904n:248_3: bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca. “Dveme
anya-e0904n:248_4: bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti. Katame
anya-e0904n:248_5: dve, sunikkhittañca padabyañjanaṃ attho ca sunīto, sunikkhittassa bhikkhave padabyañjanassa
anya-e0904n:248_6: atthopi sunayo hoti. Ime kho bhikkhave dve dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya
anya-e0904n:248_7: anantaradhānāya saṃvattantī”ti ca. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:251: Pucchā – bālavagge pana āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:252_0: Vissajjanā – bālavagge bhante dutiyaṃ suttaṃ “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:252_1: Katame dve, duṭṭho vā dosantaro saddho vā duggahitena. Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ
anya-e0904n:252_2: abbhācikkhantī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:254: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:255_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:255_1: Katame dve, yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti
anya-e0904n:255_2: dīpeti. Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti’ dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_3: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti. Dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:255_4: Katame dve, yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti
anya-e0904n:255_5: dīpeti. Yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpeti.
anya-e0904n:255_6: Ime kho bhikkhave dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:257: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthapañcamasuttāni bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:258_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthapañcamasuttāni “dveme bhikkhave tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhanti.
anya-e0904n:258_1: Katame dve, yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ ‘nītattho suttanto’ti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ
anya-e0904n:258_2: suttantaṃ ‘neyyattho suttanto’ti dīpetī”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:260: Pucchā – samacittavagge āvuso paṭhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:261_0: Vissajjanā – samacittavagge bhante paṭhamasuttaṃ “asappurisabhūmiñca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:261_1: desessāmi sappurisabhūmiñca, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti, evamādinā
anya-e0904n:263: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:264: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dutiyasuttaṃ “dvinnāhaṃ bhikkhave na suppatikāra vadāmi. Katamesaṃ dvinnaṃ, mātu ca pitu cā”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:266: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ samacittasuttaṃ kattha kassa kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:267: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ajjhattasaṃyojanañca āvuso puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca, taṃsuṇātha
anya-e0904n:268: Sādhukaṃ manasikarothā”ti, evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:270: Pucchā – kathañca āvuso tattha bhagavā ovādaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0904n:271: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante bhagavā “tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā’ti. Evañhi vo sāriputta sikkhitabba”nti evamādinā ovādamadāsi.
anya-e0904n:272: “Eso bhante āyasmā sāriputto pubbārāme migāramātupāsā de bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ deseti bahiddhā saṃyojanañca” –
anya-e0904n:273: Sādhu bhante bhagavā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāya.
anya-e0904n:274_0: Tā kho pana sāriputta devatā dasapi hutvā vīsampi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi
anya-e0904n:274_1: hutvā paññāsampi hutvā saṭṭhipi hutvā āraggakoṭinitudanamattepi tiṭṭhanti, na ca
anya-e0904n:275: Tasmātiha sāriputta evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ santindriyā bhavissāma santamānasā.
anya-e0904n:278: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte parisavagge paṭhamaṃ uttānasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:279_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante uttānasuttaṃ “dvemā sikkhave parisā, katamā dve, uttānā
anya-e0904n:279_1: ca parisā gambhīrā ca parisā, katamā ca bhikkhave uttānā parisā, idha bhikkhave yassaṃ
anya-e0904n:279_2: parisāyaṃ bhikkhū uddhatā honti unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā
anya-e0904n:279_3: asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave uttānā parisā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:281: Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ yadidaṃ gambhīrā parisā.
anya-e0904n:283: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:284_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ anaggavatīsuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā. Katamā
anya-e0904n:284_1: dve, anaggavatī ca parisā aggavatī ca parisā. Katamā ca bhikkhave anaggavatī parisā,
anya-e0904n:284_2: idha bhikkhave yassaṃ parisāyaṃ therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā, okkamane
anya-e0904n:284_3: pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā, na vīriyaṃ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa
anya-e0904n:284_4: adhigamāya asacchikabhassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:286: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:287_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante chaṭṭhaṃ okkācitavinītasuttaṃ “dvemā bhikkhave parisā.
anya-e0904n:287_1: Katamā dve, okkācitavinītā parisā no paṭipucchāvinītā, paṭipucchā vinītā parisā no
anya-e0904n:290: Pucchā – puggalavagge āvuso ekādasamaṃ asantasannivāsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:291_1: vo bhikkhave desessāmi santasannivāsañca, taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasikarotha bhāsissāmī”ti
anya-e0904n:293: Pucchā – sukhavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:294_0: Vissajjanā – sukhavagge bhante bhagavatā “dvemāni bhikkhave sukhāni. Katamāni dve,
anya-e0904n:294_1: gihisukhañca pabbajitasukhañca, imāni kho bhikkhave dve sukhāni. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:294_2: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sukhānaṃ yadidaṃ pabbajitasukha”nti evamādikā dhammadesanāyo desitā.
anya-e0904n:296: Pucchā – āyācanavagge pana āvuso bhagavatā paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni kathaṃ bhāsitāni.
anya-e0904n:297_0: Vissajjanā – āyācanavagge bhante paṭhamādīni cattāri suttāni “saddho bhikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0904n:297_1: evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya tādiso homi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā”ti, evamādinā
anya-e0904n:299: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:300_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante pañcamaṃ avaṇṇārahasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi
anya-e0904n:300_1: samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca
anya-e0904n:300_2: hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti, evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:302: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye dukanipāte āyācanavagge chaṭṭhaṃ appasādanīyasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:303_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante appasādanīyasuttaṃ “dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n:303_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n:303_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi dvīhi, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā
anya-e0904n:303_3: appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti, ananuvicca apariyo gāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne
anya-e0904n:305: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:306_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante sattamaṃ mātāpitusuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchā paṭipajjamāno
anya-e0904n:306_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hohi sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n:306_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamesu dvīsu, mātari ca pitari cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:308: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:309_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ tathāgatasuttaṃ “dvīsu bhikkhave micchāpaṭipajjamāno
anya-e0904n:309_1: bālo abyatto asappuriso etaṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo
anya-e0904n:309_2: ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamesu dvīsu, tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake
anya-e0904n:312: Pucchā – tikanipāte pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ bhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:313_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ “yāni kānici bhikkhave bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0904n:313_1: sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato. Ye keci uppaddavā uppajjanti, sabbete
anya-e0904n:313_2: bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato. Yekeci upasaggā uppajjanti, sabbete bālato uppajjanti
anya-e0904n:315: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ cintīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:316_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante cintīsuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni
anya-e0904n:316_1: bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni. Katamāni tīṇi, idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca
anya-e0904n:316_2: hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī ca dukkaṭakammakārī cā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:318: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:319_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthaṃ accayasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n:319_1: bālo veditabbo. Katamehi tīhi, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikaroti,
anya-e0904n:319_2: parassa kho pana accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:321: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:322_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaṃ malasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n:322_1: tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi, dussīlo ca hoti,
anya-e0904n:322_2: dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti. Issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0904n:322_3: Maccharī ca hoti, maccharamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:324: Pucchā – rathakāravagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ ñātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:325_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante ñātasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ñāto
anya-e0904n:325_1: bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujana dukkhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya
anya-e0904n:325_2: ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ. Katamehi tīhi, ananulomike kāyakamme samādapeti,
anya-e0904n:325_3: ananulomike vacīkamme samādapeti, ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:327: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:328: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante tatiyaṃ āsaṃsasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo nirāso āsaṃso”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:330: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte rathakāravagge pañcamaṃ sacetanasuttaṃ kattha kassa kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:331_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:331_1: rājā ahosi sacetano nāma, atha kho bhikkhave rājā sacetano rathakāraṃ āmantesi ito
anya-e0904n:331_2: me samma rathakāra channaṃ māsānaṃ paccayena saṅgāmo bhavissati sakkhissasi me samma
anya-e0904n:331_3: rathakāra navaṃ cakkayugaṃ kātu”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:333: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:334_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
anya-e0904n:334_1: bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
anya-e0904n:334_2: Katamehi tīhi, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, bhojane mattaññū
anya-e0904n:334_3: hoti, jāgariyamanuyutto hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:336: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:337_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante aṭṭhamaṃ devalokasuttaṃ “sace vo bhikkhave aññatitthiyā
anya-e0904n:337_1: paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ “devalokūpapattiyā āvuso samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0904n:337_2: vussathā’ti. Nanu tumhe bhikkhave evaṃ puṭṭhā aṭṭīyeyyātha harāyeyyātha jiguccheyyāthā”ti
anya-e0904n:339: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:340_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante navamaṃ paṭhamapāpaṇikasuttaṃ “tīhi bhikkhave aṅgehi
anya-e0904n:340_1: samannāgato pāpaṇiko abhabbo anadhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ adhigantuṃ, adhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ
anya-e0904n:340_2: phātiṃ kātuṃ. Katamehi tīhi, idha bhikkhave pāpaṇiko pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0904n:343: Pucchā – puggalavagge pana āvuso dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:344_0: Vissajjanā – puggalavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gilānasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave gilānā santo
anya-e0904n:344_1: saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, idha bhikkhave ekacco gilāno labhanto vā sappāyāni
anya-e0904n:344_2: bhojanāni alabhanto vā sappāyāni bhojanāni, labhanto vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhanto
anya-e0904n:344_3: vā sappāyāni bhesajjāni, labhanto vā patirūpaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ alabhanto vā patirūpaṃ
anya-e0904n:344_4: upaṭṭhākaṃ vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:346: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:347_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante catutthaṃ bahukārasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā
anya-e0904n:347_1: puggalassa bahukārā. Katame tayo, yaṃ bhikkhave puggalaṃ āgamma puggalo buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
anya-e0904n:347_2: gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti. Ayaṃ bhikkhave puggalo
anya-e0904n:347_3: imassa puggalassa bahukāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:349: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge sattamaṃ jigucchitabbasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:350_0: Vissajjanā – sattamaṃ bhante jigucchitabbasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo
anya-e0904n:350_1: saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo
anya-e0904n:350_2: na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo
anya-e0904n:350_3: na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthi bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti
anya-e0904n:351: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā jigucchitabbo puggalo nasevitabbo nabhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:352_0: Vissajjanā – “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n:352_1: na payirupāsitabbo. Idha bhikkhave ekacco dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro
anya-e0904n:352_2: paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti
anya-e0904n:352_3: avassuto kasambujāto, evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n:352_4: na payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n:353: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā ajjhupekkhitabbo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:354_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
anya-e0904n:354_1: na payirupāsitabbo, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo, appampi
anya-e0904n:354_2: vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca
anya-e0904n:354_3: pātukarotī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na
anya-e0904n:355: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo puggalo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:356_0: Vissajjanā – “katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo, idha
anya-e0904n:356_1: bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, evarūpo bhikkhave puggalo sevitabbo
anya-e0904n:356_2: bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā sevitabbo puggalo
anya-e0904n:358: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:359_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante puggalavagge aṭṭhamaṃ gūthabhāṇīsuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:359_1: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, gūthabhāṇī pupphabhāṇī madhubhāṇī”ti
anya-e0904n:361: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gūthabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:362_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo gūthabhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n:362_1: sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagatovā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagatovā
anya-e0904n:362_2: abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho “ehambho purisa yaṃ jānāsi, taṃ vadehī”ti. So ajānaṃ vā āha
anya-e0904n:362_3: “jānāmī”ti, jānaṃ vā āha “na jānāmī”ti, apassaṃ vā āha “passāmī”ti, passaṃ vā āha
anya-e0904n:362_4: “na passāmī”ti. Iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsitā
anya-e0904n:362_5: hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo gūthabhāṇīti, evaṃ kho bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0904n:364: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā pupphabhāṇīpuggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:365_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo pupphabhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n:365_1: sabhaggato vā parisaggato vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagatovā rājakulamajjhagato
anya-e0904n:365_2: vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho “ehambho purisa yaṃ pajānāsi, taṃ vadehī”ti. So ajānaṃ vā
anya-e0904n:365_3: āha “na jānāmī”ti, jānaṃ vā āha “jānāmī”ti, apassaṃ vā āha “na passāmī”ti, passaṃ
anya-e0904n:365_4: vā āha “passāmī”ti, iti attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā na sampajānamusā
anya-e0904n:365_5: bhāsitā hoti, ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo pupphabhāṇīti, evaṃ kho bhante tattha
anya-e0904n:367: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:368: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo madhubhāṇī, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato
anya-e0904n:369: Hotīti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha madhubhāṇī puggalo pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:371: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:372_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante puggalavagge navamaṃ andhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā
anya-e0904n:372_1: santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:373: Pucchā – kīdiso āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:374: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu natthi, ediso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā andho akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:375: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:376: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesuyeva paññācakkhu atthi na dhammesu. Īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā ekacakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:377: Pucchā – kīdiso pana āvuso puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:378: Vissajjanā – yassa bhante bhogesu ceva dhammesu ca paññācakkhu atthi, īdiso bhante puggalo tattha bhagavatā dvicakkhu akkhāto.
anya-e0904n:380: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte puggalavagge dasamaṃ avakujjasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:381_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante avakujjasuttaṃ “tayo me bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n:381_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, avakujjapañño puggalo ucchaṅgapañño puggalo puthupañño puggalo.
anya-e0904n:381_2: Katamo ca bhikkhave avakujjapañño puggalo. Idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ārāmaṃ gantā
anya-e0904n:381_3: hoti abhikkhaṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammassavanāya, tassa bhikkhū dhammaṃ desentiādikalyāṇaṃ
anya-e0904n:381_4: majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
anya-e0904n:381_5: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsenti. So tasmiṃ āsane nisinno tassā kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0904n:381_6: na majjhaṃ manasikaroti, na pariyosānaṃ manasikaroti, vuṭṭhitopi tamhā āsanā tassā
anya-e0904n:381_7: kathāya nevādiṃ manasikaroti, na majjhaṃ manasikaroti, na pariyosānaṃ manasikarotī”ti
anya-e0904n:383: Pucchā – devadūtavagge pana āvuso paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:384_0: Vissajjanā – devadūtavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ sabrahmakasuttaṃ “sabrahmakāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:384_1: tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Sapubbacariyakāni
anya-e0904n:384_2: bhikkhave tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Āhuneyyāni
anya-e0904n:384_3: bhikkhave tāni kulāni, yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. Brahmāti
anya-e0904n:384_4: bhikkhave mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pubbācariyāti bhikkhave mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ
anya-e0904n:384_5: adhivacanaṃ. Āhuneyyāti bhikkhave etaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu, bahukārā
anya-e0904n:384_6: bhikkhave mātāpitaro puttānaṃ āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro”ti, evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n:387: Tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito;
anya-e0904n:388: Annena atha pānena, vatthena sayanena ca;
anya-e0904n:391: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatīti –
anya-e0904n:392: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:393_0: Vissajjanā – pañcamaṃ bhante hatthakasuttaṃ āḷaviyaṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:393_1: Hatthako bhante āḷavako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kacci bhante bhagavā sukhamasayitthā”ti.
anya-e0904n:393_2: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti,
anya-e0904n:393_3: ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:395: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n:396: “Evaṃ kumāra sukhamasayittha, ye ca pana loke sukhaṃ senti, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”.
anya-e0904n:406: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge chaṭṭhaṃ devadūtasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:407_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ bhante devadūtasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave devadūtāni. Katamāni
anya-e0904n:407_1: tīṇi, idha bhikkhave ekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā
anya-e0904n:407_2: duccaritaṃ carati. So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā
anya-e0904n:407_3: duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0904n:407_4: Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā nānābāhāsu gahetvā yamassa rañño dassenti-ayaṃ deva
anya-e0904n:407_5: puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asāmañño abrahmañño, na kule jeṭṭhapacāyī, imassa devo
anya-e0904n:407_6: daṇḍaṃ paṇetū”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:408: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño paṭhamadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:409_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati
anya-e0904n:409_1: samanubhāsati “ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti
anya-e0904n:409_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño paṭhamadevadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:410: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:412: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:413_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n:413_1: samanubhāsitvā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho
anya-e0904n:413_2: purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:413_3: tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño dutiyā devadūtasamanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:414: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu dutiya devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:415: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthīṃ vā purisaṃ vā ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ sake muttakarīse palipannaṃ semānaṃ aññehi vuṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ aññehi saṃvesiyamānaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:417: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā yamassa rañño tatiyadevadūta samanuyuñjanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:418_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave yamo rājā dutiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n:418_1: samanubhāsitvā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjati samanugāhati samanubhāsati “ambho
anya-e0904n:418_2: purisa natvaṃ manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtanti” evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0904n:419: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ pātubhūtaṃ”.
anya-e0904n:420: “Ambho purisa na tvaṃ addasa manussesu itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ” –
anya-e0904n:422: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa sattassa niraya dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:423_0: Vissajjanā – tamenaṃ bhikkhave “yamo rājā tatiyaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā samanugāhitvā
anya-e0904n:423_1: samanubhāsitvā tuṇhī hoti. Tamenaṃ bhikkhave nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma
anya-e0904n:423_2: kāraṇaṃ karonti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiyasmiṃ hatthe
anya-e0904n:423_3: gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiyasmiṃ pāde gamenti,
anya-e0904n:423_4: tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ majjheurasmiṃ gamenti. So tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā
anya-e0904n:423_5: vedayati, na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti, yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhotī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:423_6: bhante tattha bhagavatā nerayikassa nirayadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā pakāsitā.
anya-e0904n:425: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṃvejanīyakathā kathitā.
anya-e0904n:426_0: Vissajjanā – bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave yamassa rañño etadahosi “ye kira bho loke pāpakāni
anya-e0904n:426_1: kammāni karonti, te evarūpā vividhā kammakaraṇā karīyanti, ahovatāhaṃ manussattaṃ
anya-e0904n:426_2: labheyyaṃ, tathāgato ca loke uppajjeyya arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:427: “Ye kira bho loke pāpakāni kammāni karonti”.
anya-e0904n:430: Ye ca kho devadūtehi, santo sappurisā idha;
anya-e0904n:437: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte devadūtavagge aṭṭhamaṃ catumahārājasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:438_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhamaṃ bhante catumahārājasuttaṃ “aṭṭhamiyaṃ bhikkhave pakkhassa catunnaṃ
anya-e0904n:438_1: mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicaranti kacci bahū manussā manussesu
anya-e0904n:438_2: matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti,
anya-e0904n:439: Appakā kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti, puññāni karonti.
anya-e0904n:440: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā parihāyissanti, paripūrissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n:441: Bahū kho mārisā manussā manussesu matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhapacāyino, uposathaṃ upavasanti paṭijāgaronti, puññāni karonti.
anya-e0904n:442: “Dibbā vata bho kāyā paripūrissanti, parihāyissanti asura kāyā” –
anya-e0904n:444: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:445_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dasamaṃ ādhipateyyasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave ādhipateyyāni.
anya-e0904n:445_1: Katamāni tīṇi, attādhipateyyaṃ lokādhipateyyaṃ dhammādhipateyyaṃ. Katamañca bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:445_2: attādhipateyyaṃ, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato
anya-e0904n:445_3: vā iti paṭisañcikkhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:447: Pucchā – brāhmaṇavagge āvuso catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:448_0: Vissajjanā – brāhmaṇavagge bhante catutthaṃ paribbājakasuttaṃ aññataraṃ brāhmaṇa
anya-e0904n:448_1: paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇaparibbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0904n:448_2: “sanniṭṭhiko dhammo sandiṭṭhiko dhammoti bho gotama vuccati, kittāvatānu kho bho
anya-e0904n:448_3: gotama sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo
anya-e0904n:448_4: viññūhī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto
anya-e0904n:448_5: attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhaya byābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi
anya-e0904n:448_6: dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, rāge pahīne nevattabyābādhāyapi ceteti, naparabyābādhāyapi
anya-e0904n:448_7: ceteti, naubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, nacetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
anya-e0904n:450: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ vacchagottasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:451_0: Vissajjanā – sattamaṃ bhante vacchagottasuttaṃ vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0904n:451_1: bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sutaṃ metaṃ bho gotama
anya-e0904n:451_2: samaṇo gotamo evamāha “mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ dānaṃ dātabba. (Peyyāla)
anya-e0904n:451_3: anabbhakkhā tukāmāhi mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotama”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te
anya-e0904n:451_4: vaccha evamāhaṃsu samaṇo gotamo evamāha mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ dātabba”nti
anya-e0904n:453: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ saṅgāravasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:454_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante saṅgāravasuttaṃ saṅgāravaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:454_1: Saṅgāravo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mayamassu bho gotama brāhmaṇā nāma
anya-e0904n:454_2: yaññaṃ yajāmapi yajāpemapi, tatra bho gotama yo ceva yajati yo ca yajāpeti, sabbe
anya-e0904n:454_3: te anekasārīrikaṃ puññappaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā honti, yadidaṃ yaññādhikaraṇaṃ, yopanāyaṃ
anya-e0904n:454_4: bho gotama yassa vā kulā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito ekamattānaṃ dameti, ekamattānaṃ
anya-e0904n:454_5: sameti, ekamattānaṃ parinibbāpeti, evamassāyaṃ ekasārīrikaṃ puññappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno
anya-e0904n:454_6: hoti, yadidaṃ pabbajjādhikaraṇa”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tenahi brāhmaṇa taññevettha
anya-e0904n:454_7: paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:455: “Iccāyapi bho gotama evaṃ bhante anekasārīrikā puññappaṭipadā hoti” –
anya-e0904n:456: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiya anusandhimhi bhagavatā kīdisī dhammadesanā desitā.
anya-e0904n:457: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante dutiye anusandhimhi tividhā pāṭihāriyā paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0904n:458: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n:459: “Seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo bhavañcānando, ete me pujjā ete me pāsaṃsā” –
anya-e0904n:461: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanimāte mahāvagge tatiyaṃ venāgapurasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:462_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante venāgapure nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ gāme venāgapurikaṃ vacchagottaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_1: brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Venāgapuriko bhante vacchagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_2: etadavoca “acchariyaṃ bho gotama, abbhutaṃ bho gotama, yāvañcidaṃ bhoto gotamassa
anya-e0904n:462_3: vippasannāni indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto (peyyāla) evarūpānaṃ nūna
anya-e0904n:462_4: bhavaṃ gotamo uccāsayana mahāsayanānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0904n:462_5: vatthusmiṃ “yāni kho pana tāni brāhmaṇa uccāsayana mahāsayanāni. Seyyathidaṃ, āsandi
anya-e0904n:462_6: pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī kaṭṭissaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_7: koseyyaṃ kuṭṭakaṃ hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ ajinappaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṃ
anya-e0904n:462_8: sauttaracchadaṃ ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṃ. Dullabhāni tāni pabbajitānaṃ, laddhā ca pana
anya-e0904n:465: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:466_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n:466_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi, so pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0904n:466_2: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā dibbaṃ
anya-e0904n:468: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā brahmaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:469_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n:469_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmīti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:470: Katamaṃ pana taṃ bho gotama brahmauccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ.
anya-e0904n:472: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:473_0: Vissajjanā – idhāhaṃ brāhmaṇa yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n:473_1: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi. So pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0904n:473_2: piṇḍapāta paṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyaṃ
anya-e0904n:474: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso mahāvagge pañcamaṃ kesamuttisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:475_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante kesamuttenāma kālāmānaṃ nigame kesamuttiye kālāme ārabbha
anya-e0904n:475_1: bhāsitaṃ. Kesamuttiyā bhante kālāmā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “santi bhante eke samaṇa
anya-e0904n:475_2: brāhmaṇā kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti, te sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti, jotenti, parappavādaṃ
anya-e0904n:475_3: pana khuṃsenti vambhenti paribhavanti, omakkhiṃ karonti, aparepi bhante eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0904n:475_4: kesamuttaṃ āgacchanti, tepi sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpenti jotenti, parappavādaṃ pana khuṃsenti
anya-e0904n:475_5: vambhenti paribhavanti, omakkhiṃ karonti. Tesaṃ no bhante amhākaṃ hoteva kaṅkhā,
anya-e0904n:475_6: hoti vicikicchā ko su nāma imesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ āha, ko musā”ti.
anya-e0904n:475_7: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alañhi vo kālāmā kaṅkhituṃ alaṃ vicikicchituṃ, kaṅkhīyeva
anya-e0904n:475_8: pana vo ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:477: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte mahāvagge dasamaṃ uposathasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:478_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante visākhaṃ migāramātaraṃ ārabbha “tayo kho me visākhe
anya-e0904n:478_1: uposathā. Katame tayo. Gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:479: Handa kuto nu tvaṃ visākhe āgacchasi divā divassa.
anya-e0904n:480: “Tayo kho me visākhe uposathā. Katame tayo, gopālakuposatho nigaṇṭhuposatho ariyuposatho” –
anya-e0904n:482: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:483_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe gopālakuposatho hoti, seyyathāpi visākhe gopālako sāyanhasamaye
anya-e0904n:483_1: sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati “ajja kho gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca
anya-e0904n:483_2: padese cariṃsu, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni piviṃsu.
anya-e0904n:484: Sve dāni gāvo amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese carissanti, amukasmiñca amukasmiñca padese pānīyāni pivissantī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā gopālakuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:486: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā nigaṇṭhuposatho pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:487_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe nigaṇṭhuposatho hoti, atthi visākhe nigaṇṭhānāma samaṇajātikā,
anya-e0904n:487_1: te sāvakaṃ evaṃ samādapenti, “ehitvaṃ ambhopurisa ye puratthimāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ
anya-e0904n:487_2: yojanasataṃ, tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhi, ye pacchimāya disāya. Ye uttarāya disāya. Ye
anya-e0904n:487_3: dakkhiṇāya disāya pāṇā paraṃ yojanasataṃ, tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0904n:489: Ehi tvaṃ ambho purisa sabbacelāni nikkhipitvā evaṃ vadehi.
anya-e0904n:490: Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcana tatthi.
anya-e0904n:492: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyuposatho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0904n:493_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca visākhe ariyuposatho hoti, upakkiliṭṭhassa visākhe cittassa
anya-e0904n:493_1: upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. Kathañca visākhe upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa upakkamena
anya-e0904n:493_2: pariyodapanā hoti. Idha visākhe ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati “itipi so bhagavā
anya-e0904n:493_3: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
anya-e0904n:493_4: satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti. Tassa tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdati,
anya-e0904n:493_5: pāmojjaṃ uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesā te pahīyantīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0904n:494: Pucchā – evaṃ upavutthassa pana āvuso ariyuposathassa kathaṃ mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0904n:495_0: Vissajjanā – kīvamahapphalā hoti, kīvamahānisaṃso, kīvamahājutiko, kīvamahāvipphāro,
anya-e0904n:495_1: seyyathāpi visākhe yo imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ mahājanapadānaṃ pahūtarattajanapadānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ
anya-e0904n:495_2: rajjaṃ kāreyya, seyyathidaṃ “aṅgānaṃ magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalānaṃ vajjīnaṃ mallānaṃ
anya-e0904n:495_3: cetīnaṃ vaṅgānaṃ kurūnaṃ pañcālānaṃ macchānaṃ sūrasenānaṃ assakānaṃ avantīnaṃ gandhārānaṃ
anya-e0904n:495_4: kambojānaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa uposathassa etaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:495_5: bhante tattha bhagavatā evaṃ upavutthassa ariyuposathassa mahapphalatā mahānisaṃsatā vuttā.
anya-e0904n:498: Pucchā – aṅguttaranikāye āvuso tikanipāte ānandavagge dutiyaṃ ājīvakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:499_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ ājīvakasāvakaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0904n:499_1: ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante ājīvakasāvako gahapati
anya-e0904n:499_2: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā,
anya-e0904n:499_3: ke loke sukatā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gahapati taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi,
anya-e0904n:499_4: yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:500: “Kesaṃ no bhante ānanda dhammo svākkhāto, ke loke suppaṭipannā, ke loke sukatā”.
anya-e0904n:503: “Abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya” –
anya-e0904n:505: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso navamaṃ gandhajātasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:506_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0904n:506_1: etadavoca “tīṇimāni bhante gandhajātāni, yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati no paṭivātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0904n:506_2: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati paṭivātampi
anya-e0904n:506_3: gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0904n:506_4: “atthānanda kiñci gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho
anya-e0904n:506_5: gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:512: Pucchā – samaṇavagge āvuso dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:513_0: Vissajjanā – samaṇavagge bhante dutiyaṃ gadrabhasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gadrabho
anya-e0904n:513_1: gogaṇaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ‘ahampi dammo ahampi dammo’ti, tassa na
anya-e0904n:513_2: tādiso vaṇṇo hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, na tādiso saro hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, na tādisaṃ
anya-e0904n:513_3: padaṃ hoti seyyathāpi gunnaṃ, so gogaṇaṃyeva piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho hoti ahampi
anya-e0904n:513_4: dammo ahampi dammo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:517: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso ekādasamaṃ saṅkavāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:518_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante saṅkavāyaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigame kassapagottaṃ nāma
anya-e0904n:518_1: bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kassapa gotto bhante bhikkhu bhagavati manopadūsitvā bhagavato
anya-e0904n:518_2: santike accayaṃ accayato desesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “thero cepi kassapa bhikkhu
anya-e0904n:518_3: na sikkhākāmo na sikkhāsamādānassa vaṇṇavādī. Ye caññe bhikkhū na sikkhākāmā, te
anya-e0904n:518_4: ca na sikkhāya samādapeti, ye caññe bhikkhū sikkhākāmā tesañca na vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati
anya-e0904n:518_5: bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:521: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte loṇakapallavagge paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:522_0: Vissajjanā – loṇakapallavagge bhante paṭhamaṃ accāyikasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:522_1: kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni. Katamāni tīṇi, idha bhikkhave kassako
anya-e0904n:522_2: gahapati sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ
anya-e0904n:522_3: sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti. Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni
anya-e0904n:522_4: patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi. Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi
anya-e0904n:522_5: kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:525: Pucchā – sambodhavagge panāvuso pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:526_0: Vissajjanā – sambodhavagge bhante pañcamaṃ ruṇṇasuttaṃ “ruṇṇamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa
anya-e0904n:526_1: vinaye yadidaṃ gītaṃ, ummattakamidaṃ bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ naccaṃ, komārakamidaṃ
anya-e0904n:526_2: bhikkhave ariyassa vinaye yadidaṃ ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakahasitaṃ. Tasmātiha bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:526_3: setughāto gīte setughāto nacce, alaṃ vo dhammappamoditānaṃ sataṃ sitaṃ sitamattāyā”ti
anya-e0904n:528: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sattamaṃ arakkhitasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:529_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anātapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “citte gahapati arakkhite
anya-e0904n:529_1: kāyakammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi. Manokammampi arakkhitaṃ hoti. Tassa arakkhitakāyakammantassa
anya-e0904n:529_2: arakkhitavacīkammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kāyakammampi avassutaṃ hoti, vacīkammampi
anya-e0904n:529_3: avassutaṃ hoti, manokammampi avassutaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:532: Pucchā – āpāyikavagge āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:533_0: Vissajjanā – āpāyikavagge bhante chaṭṭhaṃ apaṇṇakasuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vipattiyo.
anya-e0904n:533_1: Katamā tisso sīlavipatti, cittavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti. Katamā ca bhikkhave sīlavipatti,
anya-e0904n:533_2: idha bhikkhave ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… samphappalāpī hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:536: Pucchā – kusināravagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ kusinārasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:537_0: Vissajjanā – kusinārāyaṃ bhante baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “idha
anya-e0904n:537_1: bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, tamenaṃ gahapati
anya-e0904n:537_2: vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimantetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:539: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ hatthakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:540_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante hatthakena devaputtena saddhiṃ “ye te hatthaka dhammā
anya-e0904n:540_1: pubbe manussabhūtassa pavattino ahesuṃ, apinu te te dhammā etarahi pavattino”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:542: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ anuruddhasuttaṃ kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:543_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhamaṃ bhante anuruddhasuttaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha
anya-e0904n:543_1: āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “yaṃ kho te āvuso anuruddhaṃ evaṃ hoti
anya-e0904n:543_2: ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokaṃ volokemī’ti,
anya-e0904n:544: “Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatu” –
anya-e0904n:547: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena aṅguttaranikāye tikanipāte kusināravagge navamaṃ paṭicchannasuttaṃ kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:548_0: Vissajjanā – navamaṃ bhante paṭicchannasuttaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave paṭicchannāni āvahanti
anya-e0904n:548_1: no vivaṭāni. Katamāni tīṇi, mātugāmo bhikkhave paṭicchanno āvahati no vivaṭo, brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0904n:548_2: bhikkhave mantā paṭicchannā āvahanti no vivaṭā, micchādiṭṭhi bhikkhave paṭicchannā
anya-e0904n:548_3: āvahati no vivaṭā. Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi paṭicchannāni āvahanti no vivaṭānī”ti
anya-e0904n:550: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dasamaṃ lekhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:551_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante lekhasuttaṃ “tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n:551_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo, pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo pathavilekhūpamo puggalo udakalekhūpamo
anya-e0904n:551_2: puggalo. Katamo ca bhikkhave pāsāṇa lekhūpamo puggalo, idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo
anya-e0904n:551_3: abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati, so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:551_4: pāsāṇalekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti, evameva kho
anya-e0904n:551_5: bhikkhave idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati, so ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
anya-e0904n:551_6: Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:554: Pucchā – yodhājīvavagge pana āvuso pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:555_0: Vissajjanā – yodhājīvavagge bhante pañcamaṃ kesakambalasuttaṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:555_1: yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati. Kesakambalo
anya-e0904n:555_2: bhikkhave sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso. Evameva kho bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:555_3: yānikānici puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇavādānaṃ, makkhalivādo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyatīti
anya-e0904n:558: Pucchā – maṅgalavagge panāvuso navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:559_0: Vissajjanā – maṅgalavagge bhante navamaṃ vandanāsuttaṃ “tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā.
anya-e0904n:559_1: Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”ti, evaṃ kho
anya-e0904n:560: “Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā. Katamā tisso, kāyena vācāya manasā. Imā kho bhikkhave tisso vandanā”.
anya-e0904n:562: Pucchā – tattho āvuso dasamaṃ pubbaṇhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:563_0: Vissajjanā – dasamaṃ bhante pubbaṇhasuttaṃ “ye bhikkhave sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena
anya-e0904n:563_1: sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti. Supubbaṇho
anya-e0904n:563_2: bhikkhave tesaṃ sattānaṃ. Ye bhikkhave sattā majjhanhikasamayaṃ…pe… sāyanhasamayaṃ
anya-e0904n:563_3: kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti. Susāyanho
anya-e0904n:563_4: bhikkhave tesaṃ sattāna”nti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:568: Pucchā – catukkanipāte pana āvuso bhaṇḍagāmavagge paṭhamaṃ anubuddhasuttaṃ bhagavatā sattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:569_0: Vissajjanā – vajjīsu bhante bhaṇḍagāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “catunnaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:569_1: dhammānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva
anya-e0904n:569_2: tumhākañca. Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ, ariyassa bhikkhave sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n:569_3: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca. Ariyassa bhikkhave
anya-e0904n:569_4: samādhissa…. Ariyāya bhikkhave paññāya…. Ariyāya bhikkhave vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā
anya-e0904n:569_5: evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0904n:571: Pu – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0904n:572_0: Vi – tattha bhante chaṭṭhaṃ appassutasuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā
anya-e0904n:572_1: lokasmiṃ. Katame cattāro, appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno,
